message: Let's be fair and split the money in a 60/40 ratio. Time is of the essence, Bob, as inflation eats away at the value.
Alice, your offer was tempting, but let's be realistic.  I'm feeling the inflation pinch already. How about a slightly better split for me this time?
Bob, inflation is only going to get worse for you. This offer is a good compromise. Take it while you can still get a decent share!
